jp_text: あっ　長谷部　今日こそはあんたに勝つわよ

en_text: Accept my challenge!
jp_text: 勝負しなさい

en_text: What's wrong, Tohko-san?
jp_text: 塔子さん　どうしたんですか

en_text: But, actually...
jp_text: ていうか　もはや無･･･

en_text: She said that she'd never gone out with a guy...
jp_text: 男と付き合ったことないって言ってたのに
google_translated: I said that I had never been associated with a man

en_text: H-Hasebe-kun, I'm going bald!
jp_text: ていうか　告って飯一緒に行ってデートOKして
google_translated: I told you to say, go dating together

en_text: But you're gonna make this body bald!
jp_text: 決して本体は禿げてないよ
google_translated: Never the body is not bald

en_text: Lucy... you seem happy.
jp_text: ルーシー　幸せそうだね

en_text: Huh? Oh, sorry. I'm at work, so I should calm down a bit.
jp_text: すみません　仕事中なのに浮かれてて
google_translated: Sorry I'm floating that I'm working

en_text: Who is it? Um...
jp_text: 誰と？

en_text: Wh-What does that mean?
jp_text: あの　誰と

en_text: Oh? Chihaya-san didn't tell you?
jp_text: あれ　千早さんに聞いたんじゃなかったんですか

en_text: I finally won my Tosho card!
jp_text: 私　このたび　図書カードが当選しまして
google_translated: I have won the book card this time

en_text: Oh, speaking of being happy,
jp_text: あっ　おめでたいと言えば

en_text: I went out for dinner with Miyoshi-san and Kaoru-san yesterday.
jp_text: 昨日　三好さんと薫さんと三人でご飯食べたんですが
google_translated: I ate rice with Miyo Sanma and Sakai and Three people

en_text: And I heard that Kaoru-san is getting married.
jp_text: 結婚することになりました

en_text: Congratulations!
jp_text: おめでとうございます

en_text: Your sister's getting married.
jp_text: お姉ちゃんこのたび

en_text: Isn't that exciting?
jp_text: ど･･･どうしました

en_text: I've completely embarrassed myself!
jp_text: すごく自分が恥ずかしい

en_text: Please don't even ask!
jp_text: なにも聞かないで

en_text: Your phone broke.
jp_text: 携帯　壊れてしまいましたよ

en_text: I wanted to buy a new one anyway.
jp_text: どうせ買い換えるつもりだったし
google_translated: I was going to buy anyway

en_text: I was going to erase all of the girls' email addresses.
jp_text: 女子のアドレス全部消そうと思って
google_translated: I think I'm going to erase all the girls' address

en_text: Uh... I think you probably need to keep your female relatives' and coworkers' contact information...
jp_text: あの　女性のご家族と同僚の連絡先は残しといたほうが
google_translated: It is better to leave that female family and colleague contact information

en_text: I know that! That's not what I meant! I said girls!
jp_text: 女子って言ったろう

en_text: What do you mean...
jp_text: どういうことですか

en_text: It means I don't need any girl other than you, Lucy.
jp_text: ルーシー以外の女の子はいらないってこと
google_translated: There is no girl other than Lucy

en_text: That was the perfect opportunity to ask for her contact information.
jp_text: 今の流れで連絡先を聞けばよかった
google_translated: I wish I heard the contact information in the current flow

en_text: Thank you.
jp_text: ありがとうございます

en_text: Please calm down about winning your Tosho card already.
jp_text: 図書カードが当たっただけでそんなに浮つかないでください
google_translated: Please do not float so much just by hitting the book card

en_text: Huh? I-I'm not really...
jp_text: 別に浮ついてません

en_text: What's wrong, Hasebe?
jp_text: どうした　長谷部

en_text: Don't ask me anything.
jp_text: 何も聞かないで

en_text: This week's Magical Quiz!
jp_text: 今週のマジカルクイズ

en_text: who attacked Blue Hydrangea's first love, Shuzo-kun?
jp_text: 第６８話でブルー・ハイドランジアの初恋の相手修造くんを襲った妖精の名前は？
google_translated: In Episode 68, what is the name of the fairy who attacked the opponent of the first love of Blue Hydrangeia?
